Play around with the box a bit - see if there's anything you can do with it that you might not expect. In particular, try something that may be related to the puzzle's title.
Try performing keyboard shortcuts with Alt (PC) or Ctrl (Mac).
Not all of the shortcuts do what you might expect them to; see if you can keep track of those in particular.
The mismatched shortcut letters form a cluephrase that fits that blanks at the bottom. The answer is a single word for the action described in the cluephrase.
